ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Danish Defence Acquisition and Logistics Organization (DALO)

CONTENTS.P: Yderligere supplerende oplysninger

DALO has decided to discontinue the current tender procedure and change to the negotiated procedure without publication of a contract notice in accordance with the Directive 2009/81/EC article 28, 1 (a).
The basis for the change in procedure is that no tenders were submitted within the deadline of 28.2.2018 at 10:00 am CET.
DALO has decided to invite 2 suppliers for the negotiations, and these will be informed individually.
